reference.shortdesc: Choices contain a list of choices for users that need to choose one of several actions while performing the steps of a task.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The choices element is specialized from ul. It is defined in the task module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <step><cmd>Choose a server.</cmd> <choices> <choice>If you have a remote server you want to test on, type the IP address or hostname of the server here.</choice> <choice>If you want to do local testing, just type localhost.</choice> </choices> </step>
